meanings.definition: An animal that is one year old
meanings.sent1: The farmer's yearlings grazed happily in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The zoo welcomed a new batch of yearlings to their animal family.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous yearlings played tag around the barnyard.
meanings.sent4: The yearlings' energy was like a bubbling stream, always flowing.
meanings.sent5: The young yearlings' playful antics brought joy to all who watched.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is one year old
meanings.sent1: The toddler proudly showed off her yearlings to her grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The technology company released a new line of yearlings in the market.
meanings.sent3: The yearlings' first birthday party was a colorful affair.
meanings.sent4: The yearlings of the forest whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The tiny yearlings' curiosity knew no bounds as they explored the world around them.
